name: Learning English With Takako
description:
Inspired by the SeaBed visual novel created by Paleontology. Set before the prologue of the visual novel we have Sachiko and Takako practicing their English in anticipation for their upcoming trip to the southern islands of Australia. 

It is highly recommended that you read SeaBed before this; you can find SeaBed here: https://fruitbat-factory.itch.io/seabed.
